text: Ghazi ibn Faisal () (21 March 1912 – 4 April 1939) was the King of Iraq from 1933 to 1939. He was the only son of Faisal I, the first King of Iraq. He was killed in a car crash on 4 April 1939 in Baghdad, Kingdom of Iraq at the age of 27.Safa Khulusi, Ma'ruf Al-Rusafi (1875–1945). The Muslim World, Hartford Seminary Foundation, LXVII No.1, 1977. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1939 deaths Category:Kings of Iraq Category:Road accident deaths
title: Ghazi of Iraq
